howItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple 4 Steps
howItWorks.description: From video upload to winner determination, everything is automated in our battle system

upload.title: Video Upload
upload.description: Upload your beatbox video. You can post once every hour and automatically enter the matching queue.

matching.title: Auto Matching
matching.description: Opponents are automatically selected based on ELO rating. Gradually expand matching range to find optimal opponents.

voting.title: Community Voting
voting.description: Community decides the winner during a 5-day voting period. Earn points by participating in votes and climb the voter rankings.

results.title: Results & Rankings
results.description: After winner determination, ELO ratings are automatically updated. Battle history is archived and rankings are updated.

playerRanking.title: Player Rankings
playerRanking.description: Every battle is a serious match that affects your rating. Win battles and prove your skills to the world. Only those who reach the top of the rankings can open the door to the next stage.

betaReward.title: Œ≤ Season Rewards:
betaReward.description: Top 8 in rankings earn seeded entry to Season 1 Final Tournament.

voterRanking.title: Voter Rankings
voterRanking.description: The community's keen eye decides victory. Judge countless battles and contribute to the platform with your aesthetic sense. The most trusted judges receive special honors.

betaReward.title: Œ≤ Season Rewards:
betaReward.description: Top voters will be appointed as official judges for Season 1 Final Tournament.

shadows.subtitle: The beatbox scene is exploding, but many artists face the same hurdles.

card1.title: "Watching" is growing...
card1.description: ...but "doing" and "staying" in the art form isn't keeping up. Many get lost after the initial spark.

card2.title: Beginner's Bottleneck
card2.description: Newcomers struggle to find their next step, practice partners, or a place to improve, often feeling isolated.

card3.title: Community & Opportunity Gap
card3.description: Passionate beatboxers lack a central hub. Opportunities for new talents to get recognized are limited.

card1.title: Online Battles
card1.description: Post your audio/video, battle 1-on-1 with global opponents. Get votes, earn BP, and climb the ranks!

card2.title: Global Community
card2.description: Connect with beatboxers worldwide. Share techniques, join discussions, find collaborators, and make friends.

card3.title: Rankings & Tournaments
card3.description: Prove your skills in seasonal rankings. Compete in exciting online tournaments for glory and rewards.

card4.title: Skill Growth Hub
card4.description: Access learning resources, get constructive feedback from peers and AI, and track your progress.

ready.subtitle: Your beatbox journey starts here. Join BeatNexus today and become part of the revolution.

postPage.timeLimitEmphasis: üî• Videos MUST be 1-2 minutes (60-120 seconds) long üî•

upload.title: Upload Video
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your video here
upload.orBrowse: or click to select file (MP4, WebM, MOV)

guidelines.title: Guidelines
guidelines.content: I have read and agree to the Video Submission Guidelines
guidelines.face: I understand that showing my face is optional, and showing my mouth area is recommended
guidelines.appropriate: I confirm this is my own performance and does not contain prohibited content

greetingRule.title: Opening Greeting:
greetingRule.description: Before starting your performance, declare your participation in BeatNexus with your voice. You must include the word 'BeatNexus'.

examples.title: Examples:
examples.note: You can say it however you like, but you must include the word 'BeatNexus'.

performanceTime.title: Performance Time:
performanceTime.description: Please perform within the specified time frame

performanceFormat.title: Performance Format:
performanceFormat.description: Video and audio must be recorded simultaneously. Connecting performances with cut editing is prohibited.

identityVerification.title: Identity Verification:
identityVerification.description: Showing your face is not required but recommended.

lipSyncBan.title: Lip Sync Prohibition
lipSyncBan.description: Lip syncing to pre-recorded audio (dubbing) is prohibited.

audioSource.title: Audio Source:
audioSource.description: All sounds used in the performance must be generated on the spot from your voice or body.

sampleBan.title: Sample Use Prohibition
sampleBan.description: The use of pre-recorded audio sources (samples) or metronomes that record sound is prohibited.

allowed.title: Allowed Processing
allowed.correction: Basic audio quality correction applied to the entire recording (EQ, compressor, reverb)

prohibited.title: Prohibited Processing
prohibited.effects: Effects that significantly change the original sound, such as distortion and delay
prohibited.advanced: Advanced editing that automatically changes processing for each sound

devices.title: Equipment
devices.description: All methods are welcome, from smartphones to professional equipment.

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Please avoid 4K recording as it increases file size.

hero.title: Welcome to the World of Beatbox!
hero.description: Whether you're a beginner or a pro, this platform will make your beatbox journey more exciting. Let's start this adventure together!

gettingStarted.title: üöÄ Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics of BeatNexus and start having fun right away!

steps.title: Create Your Profile
steps.description: Express your personality and get ready to join the community!
details: Share your favorite styles and goals in your bio
Show your personality with a profile picture

steps.title: Post Your First Video
steps.description: It doesn't have to be perfect. Everyone started as a beginner!
details: Even smartphone recording is enough to get started
We recommend starting with 30-second mini battles
Focus on audio quality: record in a quiet place

steps.title: Join Battles
steps.description: Auto-matching will find the perfect opponent for you!
details: Automatic matching with opponents of similar skill level
Win or lose, it's a valuable experience for growth

battleTypes.title: üéØ Battle Types
battleTypes.description: Choose from 3 battle formats and find your style!

types.name: Main Battle
types.description: Full-scale battle to showcase your skills thoroughly
tips: Think about structure: intro ‚Üí development ‚Üí climax
Combine various techniques to impress
Stay focused until the final pose
types.perfect: Perfect for those who want to show polished performances

types.name: Mini Battle
types.description: Quick battle condensing your charm in a short time
tips: Focus on impact: capture hearts in the first 5 seconds
Show off your signature moves without holding back
Every moment counts in this short format
types.perfect: Perfect for beginners who want to start easily or busy people

types.name: Theme Challenge
types.description: Creative battle challenging specific techniques or themes
tips: Take a unique approach to the theme
Don't fear technical challenges
Value perspectives different from others
types.perfect: Perfect for adventurers who want to try new techniques

votingTips.title: üó≥Ô∏è Voting Tips
votingTips.description: Become a great voter and energize the community!

guidelines.title: Technical Skills
guidelines.description: Precision, difficulty, and variety of techniques

fairPlay.title: Spirit of Fair Play
points: Judge based on skill, not personal preference
Watch both videos carefully before voting

community.title: ü§ù Enjoy the Community
community.description: Connect with beatboxers worldwide and grow together!

features.title: Comment Feature
features.description: Comment on battle videos to deepen interactions
tips: Try to give positive feedback
Mentioning specific techniques is appreciated
Questions and technical advice are welcome

features.title: Ranking System
features.description: Prove your skills with seasonal rankings
tips: Consistent participation is key to ranking up
Not just battle wins, but vote count matters too
Special rewards at the end of each season

features.title: Forum
features.description: A place for technical questions and information exchange
tips: Beginner questions are very welcome
Share technique names and practice methods
Check for regional event information too

categories.title: Recording Tips
tips: Record in bright places (face visibility)
Fix your phone to prevent shaking
Not too close, not too far from mic (~30cm)
Keep background simple (you're the star!)

categories.title: Practice Methods
tips: Consistency is key, even if just a little daily
Learn by watching others' videos
Record yourself to view objectively
Have courage to try new techniques

categories.title: Mindset
tips: There's learning even in losses (growth opportunity)
Don't compare with others, go at your own pace
Having fun is most important
Support each other with community members

troubleshooting.title: üîß FAQ & Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Check here when you're in trouble!

faqs.question: Video upload fails
faqs.answer: Check file size (75MB or less) and format (MP4, WebM, MOV). Also verify your internet connection.

faqs.question: Matching takes a long time
faqs.answer: We're looking for opponents with matching skill levels, which may take some time. Popular hours tend to match faster.

faqs.question: I missed the voting period
faqs.answer: The voting period is only 5 minutes, so we recommend turning on notifications.

faqs.question: My video won't play
faqs.answer: Try refreshing your browser or using a different browser. If it still doesn't work, contact support.

support.title: If it still doesn't resolve...
support.description: Our support team will sincerely help you!

cta.title: Ready to dive into the beatbox world!
cta.description: You're all set. It's time to make your sound resonate across the world.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: We're crafting an amazing How-to Guide for you! Learn everything about BeatNexus in an easy-to-follow format.

features.videoGuidesDesc: Watch and learn with video tutorials

launch.title: üöÄ Coming Soon
launch.description: We're working hard to bring you the best guide experience. Stay tuned!

comingSoon.meanwhile: In the meantime, why not explore some battles?

eliteOnly.title: Elite Only
eliteOnly.description: Exclusive tournament for top-ranked players of the season. Face off against the highest level beatboxers.

seasonal.title: Seasonal Format
seasonal.description: Large-scale tournaments held every 3 months. New champions emerge with each season.

bigPrizes.title: Amazing Prizes
bigPrizes.description: Winners receive exclusive trophies and special titles. Great rewards await top finishers.

step1.title: Qualifying Round
step1.description: Top 32 players from season rankings participate. 1v1 battle format determines winners.

step2.title: Main Tournament
step2.description: 16 qualified players battle in the main event. Double elimination format.

step3.title: Grand Final
step3.description: The ultimate showdown between the final 2 players. The battle to crown the true BeatNexus champion.

launch.title: üèÜ Season 1 Tournament in Preparation
launch.description: We're currently preparing for our inaugural tournament. Climb the season rankings to earn your spot in the tournament!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about BeatNexus.

howToStart.question: How do I get started with BeatNexus?
howToStart.answer: Simply create an account and set up your profile to get started. Begin by watching other battles and voting to get familiar with the platform. When you're ready, upload a video to participate in battles.

isFree.question: Is BeatNexus free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, BeatNexus is completely free to use for all core features. You can post battles, watch others, and vote without any cost.

beginnerFriendly.question: Can beginners participate?
beginnerFriendly.answer: Absolutely! BeatNexus welcomes beatboxers of all skill levels, from beginners to professionals. Our rating system ensures you're matched with opponents at your skill level.

battleTypes.question: What types of battles are available?
battleTypes.answer: There are 3 battle formats: Main Battle (60-120 seconds), Mini Battle (30-59 seconds), and Theme Challenge (specific themes or skills). We recommend beginners start with Mini Battles.

votingPeriod.question: How long is the voting period?
votingPeriod.answer: The voting period is 5 minutes. You must cast your vote within 5 minutes of the battle going live. Results are announced once voting closes.

matching.question: How are opponents matched?
matching.answer: We use a rating system to automatically find opponents close to your skill level. Our waiting pool system ensures fairer matches by considering rating differences.

showFace.question: Do I need to show my face?
showFace.answer: Showing your face is optional. However, showing your mouth area is recommended as it may help with better evaluation. Record in whatever way makes you comfortable.

videoFormats.question: What video formats are supported?
videoFormats.answer: We support MP4, WebM, and MOV formats. File size must be under 2GB. For the best beatbox experience, we recommend recording with high video quality and crystal-clear audio.

uploadFailed.question: My video upload is failing
uploadFailed.answer: Check that your file size is under 2GB and format is MP4, WebM, or MOV. Also verify your internet connection and try refreshing your browser.

mobile.question: Can I use BeatNexus on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes, BeatNexus works on mobile browsers. We're also working on dedicated mobile apps coming soon.

ranking.question: How does the ranking system work?
ranking.answer: We use an Elo rating system. Winning increases your rating while losing decreases it. Rankings reset each season, and top players can participate in tournaments.

prohibited.question: What is not allowed?
prohibited.answer: Background music, backing tracks, and copyrighted content are prohibited. Inappropriate content or behavior that makes others uncomfortable is also not allowed.

stillNeedHelp.title: Still need help?
stillNeedHelp.description: If you have questions not covered here or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us.

battleMatched.title: Battle Match Found!
battleMatched.message: An opponent has been found. Your battle has started!

to glory.
slide3.description: The path to becoming the top player in rankings. And the path to becoming an 'Official Judge' who determines victory with excellent aesthetic sense. Which legend will you carve?
